price: 21. Wuxuu cadaabi qofkuu doono, oo u naxariisan qofkuu doono, Xaggiisaana la idiin celin.
arabic: يُعَذِّبُ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَرۡحَمُ مَن يَشَآءُۖ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُقۡلَبُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yuʿadhibu man yashāu wayarḥamu man yashāu wa-ilayhi tuq'labūna
